name: Toy Pops
description:
Ludum Dare 49: Unstable

Experience a simulation with changing populations and atmospheric conditions. Can you bring stability to this environment?

Mechanics:

  • Add plants, herbivores, and carnivores to the world using Control Panel.
  • Units need to breathe: 
    • Animals convert Oxygen for Carbon Dioxide.
    • Plants convert Carbon Dioxide for Oxygen.
  • Animals need to eat. Carnivores eat Herbivores. Herbivores eat plants.

Unit-Placing Tips:

  • Hold Left-Shift to place more than one unit in the world
  • Holding Left Click will place units on interval.
  • Holding Left Ctrl while placing a unit will place multiple units!
